alert.note: Alert for Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington County through 300 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vernon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Holmes Valley, Porter Lake, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Greenhead, Sylvania and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
